alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 6:14AM PST until February 17 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty cross winds may affect roadways. This includes Interstate 5 and Highways 14 and 126 through the Santa Clarita Valley and Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon Roads. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
